comment.author: 83025347@N00
comment._content: Cirpriano Castro hung on to power for another six years then went into exile in France. Apparently no relation to Fidel.

comment.author: 60385765@N02
comment._content: [http://www.flickr.com/photos/83025347@N00] Most definitely no relation to Fidel. Castro is a rather common surname in Spanish speaking countries.
